X = np.array([[0,1,0],
             [1,0,0],
             [1,1,1],
             [0,1,1]])

y = np.array([[0,1,1,0]]).T

def sigmoid(x):
    return 1/(1+np.exp(-x))

def bce_loss(y,y_hat):
    N = y.shape[0]
    loss = -1/N * np.sum((y*np.log(y_hat) + (1 - y)*np.log(1-y_hat)))
    return loss  

W = 2*np.random.random((3,1)) - 1
b = 0

for i in range(epochs):
    # Forward pass
    z = X.dot(W) + b
    A = sigmoid(z)
# Calculate loss
    loss = bce_loss(y,A)
    print('Epoch:',i,'Loss:',loss)
    losses.append(loss)
# Calculate derivatives
    dz = (A - y)
    dW = 1/N * np.dot(X.T,dz)
    db = 1/N * np.sum(dz,axis=0,keepdims=True)
# Parameter updates
    W -= alpha * dW
    b -= alpha * db

plt.plot(losses)
plt.xlabel('epoch')
plt.ylabel('loss')
plt.show()
